title: Uncle Si and the Mother-in-Law Trap
description:
Si and the boys run smack into a mother-in-law trap set by a fan. But first, Si is fixin' to pig out on Thanksgiving. Phil Robertson's new dog is more interested in shells than ducks, but Martin defends the pup's honor. Si quit cooking for the holidays after a Thanksgiving chili incident. Godwin shares his turkey recipe. The boys talk about what they want for Christmas, add "that's a gar" to the Official Duck Call Room Glossary, and realize their redneck definition of "kolach" is a little off. And John-David reveals the unusual Thanksgiving meal that tops his list of favorites.
-
